title: Senior Product Designer
content:
Why Clipboard Health Exists:
We exist to lift as many people up the socioeconomic ladder as possible. We dramatically improve lives, by letting healthcare professionals turn extra time and ambition into career growth and financial opportunity. We achieve this with our app-based marketplace that connects healthcare facilities and healthcare professionals, allowing healthcare professionals to book on-demand shifts and healthcare facilities to access on-demand talent. Our mission is to enable healthcare professionals to work when and where they want, and to enable healthcare facilities to meet their talent needs.
About Clipboard Health:
Clipboard Health is a post-Series C, extremely fast-growing tech startup with classic two-sided network effects, revolutionizing the market for healthcare talent. We are a diverse and inclusive company with a global, remote team. We have been named one of YC’s Top Companies for two years running, and have grown 25x across all key metrics in the last 18 months. There has never been a more exciting time to join our growing team and help us serve even more healthcare professionals and healthcare facilities, who can then better serve patients. To learn more about the culture at Clipboard Health, take a look at our culture hub here.About the role:
You will be joining as one of the founding members of our design team and will set and raise the bar on the overall quality, coherence, and meaning that our products and services create in the world. Our team works within a fast-growing, quickly-moving, and complex marketplace organization. Design exists at Clipboard Heath to solve and create value around human-focused problems: trust, engagement, clarity, and safety are big themes we grapple with. 
You’ll be leading your space and helping to set and raise the bar for design at Clipboard Health. You’ll do this by driving a clear, thoughtful, and action-oriented design process, partnering across the team to define and deliver high-quality customer experience through UX, service, and product design lenses. Innovation is a big part of what we do at Clipboard. Design work is rooted in deeply understanding the customer and users, their needs, outcomes, and contexts.
You’ll learn quickly, dive deep into our business, and bring your human-centered lens to opportunities big and small across the team. This role sits within our Product team. I’d read the following docs from our team prior to applying: the Product Team Standards, Product Team Recruiting, and Product Team Structure. These documents will give you a sense of how we think and what we value. We also have more links about team and company culture on our candidate website.
Responsibilities:

Conduct in-depth user research + translate learnings into actionable insights
Brainstorm broadly and ambitiously (we welcome half-baked ideas / ideas that push the envelope)
Own the interaction and visual design for the product you work on, to create intuitive and delightful experiences for our customers
Depending on the product, you may also own brand imaging and messaging
Partner with product managers and engineers to be disciplined about prioritization 

Qualifications:

2+ years of work experience as a product designer, or a graduate degree in a design-related field
Expertise with design tools (Figma in particular) 
Relevant professional experience (startups, marketplaces) preferred
